user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for a comfortable and supportive bra that I could wear throughout the day without discomfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a wireless bra that offered both support and comfort, especially for all-day wear. The features such as the TruSupport® 4-way support system and the cushioned straps were particularly appealing, as they promised to alleviate discomfort and provide a natural shape. The emphasis on moisture-wicking fabric also caught my attention, as I wanted something that would keep me cool. Overall, the combination of comfort, support, and the brand's reputation played a significant role in my decision.

I needed a wire-free option that still provided good support. The description highlighted features like cushioned comfort straps and cotton-lined cups, which suggested a focus on comfort. I appreciated the practicality of the stay-put straps and the back closure design, which indicated ease of use. These details helped me feel confident in my choice, as I was looking for a reliable everyday bra.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort and versatility, particularly those made with moisture-wicking technology and soft, breathable materials. I value items that are durable and provide a good fit, as well as those that are affordable and offer great value for money. I tend to enjoy clothing that can be worn in various settings, whether for casual wear or during physical activities. On the other hand, I dislike products that are uncomfortable or do not meet my expectations for quality, especially in footwear. I also find it unappealing when items do not provide adequate support or comfort, which affects my overall satisfaction.

conversation.content: I want a comfortable and supportive bra for all-day wear. within my expected price range: [16.99, 18.99]
What size range are you looking for in a comfortable and supportive bra for all-day wear?
I typically look for bras in the size range of 34C to 36D for a comfortable and supportive fit throughout the day.
What color or colors do you prefer for your comfortable and supportive bra for all-day wear?
I prefer neutral colors like black, white, or nude for my comfortable and supportive bra for all-day wear.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Convertible Bra for Everyday Wear> / Item ID: B071KQC71Y / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for a lacy, wireless, full-coverage bra that offers sublimely comfortable support, look no further. The Lace Desire® bra is designed with Bali's ComfortFlex® Fit system for a perfect fit from sizes S-2XL. Wirefree cups provide full coverage and are lightly lined to shape and support. Gorgeous open lace covers the entire style and even extends above and below the cups. The no-slip straps are easily adjustable and also designed to convert to a crisscross back with the simple J-hook that's included for wearing flexibility. This bra really does offer the best of everything."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <JUST MY SIZE Women's Pure Comfort Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1274> / Item ID: B07S3LQ9NQ / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you thought it was impossible to find the support you need with the comfort you deserve, think again. JMS® presents their Pure Comfort® wireless, full-coverage bra that has everything you want in a bra. It starts with the remarkably comfortable yet effective light support, achieved with smartly engineered strategic support zones and a wider, no-roll knit underband for subtle under bust shaping. You'll love the convenience and ease of the front-close styling, with plush cushioning under the hook-and-eye panel for no-dig comfort. The seamless design gives you the sleek, smooth look you want under T-shirts and other clingy clothes. Wider straps and a built-up back help smooth away bulges even more. Plus, this wire-free tee shirt bra is made with moisture-wicking fabric that helps to keep you cool and dry all day. Made with 4-way stretch that moves effortlessly with you, there's a lot to love in this front-close wirefree bra from JMS."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Leading Lady Women's Plus-Size Leisure Front Closure Extra Comfort Bras, Sapphire, 48DDFG> / Item ID: B00EJFEUPI / Price: $18.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Relax and feel beautiful in style in Leading Lady's heavenly comfortable front closure leisure bra. The bra is made of supportive nylon, spandex that is unbelievably soft against the skin. Simple front hook-and-eye closures make it easy to dress, and a great choice for nursing moms or anyone who struggles with mobility. Plus front closures make this a terrific nighttime bra to avoid lying on uncomfortable back hooks while sleeping. The straps are lightly reinforced to reduce stretch and uphold the integrity and longevity of the bra. Expanded sizes make it easy for every woman to find their ideal fit. Plus size bra, and full figure sizes, available in leopard, sizes b, c, d 38-56 and DD, f, g 38-52. 100 percent comfort."]
I need ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] category products.
What fabric do you prefer in your comfortable and supportive bras?
I prefer bras made with moisture-wicking fabric that keeps me cool and comfortable throughout the day.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's SmoothTec ComfortFlex Fit Wirefree Bra MHG199> / Item ID: B01HRFT6YQ / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Welcome to a wireless world where you never have to sacrifice comfort for support. Hanes® Smooth Comfort® wireless bra is brilliantly constructed for both. Carefully shaped foam cups and Hanes®' stay-in-place SmoothTec® band provide all the support you need, with the brand's ComfortFlex Fit® fabric that molds to your shape, not the other way around. One of the best features of this wirefree convertible bra is the Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. This seamless, wireless bra provides full coverage with a flattering sweetheart neckline. You'll also appreciate the smooth cups and seamless construction that make this an ideal T-shirt bra. One more handy design detail is the convertible straps that offer two ways to wear for fashion flexibility."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes ComfortFlex Fit Women's Oh So Light Wireless Bra with Comfort Foam, Full-Coverage T-Shirt Bra (S-3XL), MHG521> / Item ID: B08L6CWW3F / Price: $16.1 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Customers say that Hanes® Oh So Light wireless bra is so soft and lightweight that it's almost like wearing no bra at all, other than the flexible support. This sublime comfort starts with silky ComfortFlex Fit® fabric with 4-way stretch that molds effortlessly to your shape. It continues with the flexible, lightly lined foam cups that gently shape and support. Additionally, this ultra-light T-shirt bra is designed with a stay-in-place comfort band that further enhances support. You'll love how this wirefree, full-coverage bra disappears under clothes, and you'll appreciate the lightweight mesh back for airy comfort. And wait, there's more! Convertible straps offer fashion flexibility and tagless styling provides itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Maidenform Women's Comfort Devotion Bra, Full Coverage Underwire Bra, Cushionwire T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0BQYY4ZCG / Price: $17.47 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Crafted from luxe suede-like fabric, this full coverage bra from Maidenform® feels incredibly soft and comfortable against your skin. Designed with cushioned underwire cups for extra shape and lift without the pinch and dig, this women’s bra is ideal for everyday wear. Convertible straps can be worn straight or crisscross, giving you even more versatile options. Finished with back and side smoothing for a sleek look beneath your clothes, this Maidenform women’s bra offers back hook-and-eye closure for easy styling.']
